review: I purchased the Fire Stick because my blu ray player was having problems connecting to Netflix.  The Fire Stick connects quickly, the controller is easy to use, and you can't beat the price.  Why pay $200 for a smart TV when when the Fire Stick will make your TV smart.
author: Roger Watson

review: I find this to be better than the competition (i.e. Google Chromecast, Roku) because it is easy to use and you don't have to stream through your computer. Roku is similar but I like the Amazon interface better. There are a variety of different apps; I can watch HBO GO, Hulu Plus, Netflix, view photos, use youtube, watch CBS and NBC news, and even TED talks. Very happy I purchased the fire stick.
